app.form.interestedInMobility.label: I want to receive customized information about mobility.
app.form.filledForFun.label: Just for fun.
app.form.user.confirmation.label: I accept that the city of Turku saves my mobility profile based on my answers and can use my answers as part of generalized mobility data (Survey data is not combined with personal data, it is shown as an overview as part of the mobility view of the service map.
app.form.gender.label: Gender
app.form.postalCode.field: In case you don't live in Turku, you can skip this question
app.form.optional.field: In case you don't work or study, you can skip this question
app.form.info.question: Why did I do the test?
app.text.newsletter: I want to subscribe to the sustainable mobility newsletter.
app.text.newsletter.link: Traffic and mobility newsletter's personal register
app.text.newsletter.description: The newsletter offers you clever tips and perhaps unforgettable experiences!
page.home.title: How do you move around?
page.home.subTitle: Take the Turku mobility test.
page.home.description: With this survey, you will not only find out your mobility profile, but we will also offer you useful tips about the mobility options that might interest you.
app.result.newsletter.success: You have subscribed to our newsletter.
app.question.1.description: If you do not have an opportunity to use a mode, choose 0.
app.questions.1.answer.text: Please answer all options before proceeding.
app.questions.answer.text: Please answer the question before proceeding.
